description: When 550-fill-power down meets 40g Omni-Heat Thermal insulation, magic happens. The Voodoo Falls 590 TurboDown Hooded Jacket retains nearly every degree of body heat and is one of the warmest, softest, and lightest jackets we make. A durable water resistant shell with grid baffling provides a snug, close-to-body look and feel.
name: Columbia Sportswear Voodoo Falls 590 TurboDown Hooded Jacket - Big - Mens

specs.value: 100% nylon, 100% Polyester, 550 Fill Power Down Insulation, RDS Certified, Microtemp XF II 40g 100% polyester
